org.apache.wiki.forms

Interface FormHandler


  • public interface FormHandler
    A FormHandler performs logic based on input from an HTTP FORM, transmitted through a JSPWiki WikiPlugin (see Form.java).

    This interface is currently empty and unused. It acts as a place holder: we probably want to switch from WikiPlugins to FormHandlers in Form.java, to enforce authentication, form execution permissions, and so on.
